CustomField.description:
Captures the date of first awareness for the AE.
E2B (R2): A.1.6a, receivedateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND A.1.6b, receivedate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): C.1.4 Date Report Was First Received from Source User Guidance: For organisations transmitting an initial case, this data element should be the date when the information was received from the primary source and fulfilling the 4 minimum criteria, as described in the Section 3.3.1. When retransmitting information received from another regulatory agency or another company or any other secondary source, C.1.4 should be the date the retransmitter first received the information. Conformance: Required Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: For organisations transmitting an initial case, this data element should be the date when the information was received from the primary source and fulfilling the 4 minimum criteria.
CustomField.label: Date of Awareness
